response.overview: The third installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. Three young people who visited the suspension bridge where they can enjoy the superb view are enjoying the scenery, and some mysterious figures are reflected. In addition, the mysterious figure was witnessed in various places other than the suspension bridge. Does it have anything to do with the memorial monument built at the entrance of the suspension bridge?
response.tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 3

titles.title: 超! ! 怖い心霊ビデオ3
